solution_line_template: Tony's age now is {jacob_age} / {tony_age_divisor} = <<{jacob_age}/{tony_age_divisor}={tony_age_now}>>{tony_age_now} years old.
In {years_in_future} years he will be {tony_age_now} + {years_in_future} = <<{tony_age_now}+{years_in_future}={tony_age_in_6_years}>>{tony_age_in_6_years} years old.
